    (function () {

        // our Logger object
        var Logger = {
            _instance: undefined, // we shouldn't directly touch it, it's used inside of require block
            _queue: [], // the queue should be used when _instance is not defined
            log: function (label, logObj, additionalParams) {
                additionalParams = additionalParams || {};
                if (this._instance) {
                    if (!additionalParams.preLoad) {
                        additionalParams.preLoad = 'no';
                    }
                    this._instance.logError(label, logObj, additionalParams);
                } else {
                    // we don't have a logger yet, so just queue it
                    additionalParams.preLoad = 'yes';
                    this._queue.push({
                        label: label,
                        logObj: logObj,
                        additionalParams: additionalParams
                    });
                }
            }
        };

        // it's safe to attach all handlers here
        window.addEventListener('error', function (errorEvent) {
            Logger.log('1dClientSideError', errorEvent.error, {errorMessage: errorEvent.message});
        });

        window.addEventListener('load', function () {
            if ((!document.getElementById('new-homepage-search-wizard') || !document.getElementById('new-homepage-search-wizard').hasChildNodes()) &&

                Logger.log('1dWizardFailedToLoad', {
                    pageUrl: encodeURIComponent(window.location.href)
                });
            }
        });

        require('dctk/clientLogging', function (clientLogging) {
            // the logger is ready, we can just get a reference to it
            Logger._instance = clientLogging;
            // then process the queue
            while (Logger._queue.length) {
                var queueEntry = Logger._queue.shift();
                Logger.log(queueEntry.label, queueEntry.logObj, queueEntry.additionalParams);
            }
        });

    })();

            require(['jquery', 'dctk/dctk'], function($, dctk) {
                $('#hotel-listing-module').on('click', '.flex-link', function(event) {

                    dctk.logExperiment({id: 9924, callback: function() {
                        // Workaround for logExperiment() not waiting for Omniture to be initialized
                        // or for the event to be sent successfully.
                        dctk.onReady(function() {
                            setTimeout(function() {
                                window.location.href = url;
                            }, 500);
                        });
                    }});
                });
            });

id="pocket-guide" class="toggle  module" data-type="read-more" data-open-tracking-id="TG.LP.HotelGuide.ReadMore" data-close-tracking-id="TG.LP.HotelGuide.Hide"><section id="pocket-guide-content" class="toggle-pane"><header id="pocket-guide-section-header"   class="cols-row-header cf section-header no-group"><h2 class="section-header-main">Nassau Hotel Guide</h2></header><span id="content-teaser"><div><p>From its white sand beaches to its dreamy blue water, Nassau, Bahamas is a much loved vacation destination. Visitors come here to marvel at the wonderful <a href="http://thingstodo.expedia.com/nassau-bahamas-activities/">things to do</a> Nassau is famous for. People, during their stays at Nassau hotels, enjoy endless delights from fabulous restaurants serving local delicacies to shopping at the many quaint stores. Regardless of why you choose to travel to Nassau and stay at one of the Nassau Bahamas hotels, Expedia.com has the best accommodations to fit your needs.</p><p>There are many hotels in Nassau that are especially popular with traveling families. It is easy to find a <a href="https://www.expedia.com/Nassau-Hotels-Beach-Hotel.0-0-d601784-tBeachHotel.Travel-Guide-Filter-Hotels">beach hotel</a> close to Sandy Toes beach, for example, where parents can relax in the sun as their children enjoy water activities. There are also <a href="https://www.expedia.com/Paradise-Island-Nassau-Hotels.0-n6060399-0.Travel-Guide-Filter-Hotels">Paradise Island hotels</a> which put you close to area fun spots like dolphin experiences. The pirate fans in your family will want to be sure to stay in a Nassau hotel close to the Pirates of Nassau Museum. This museum will teach young visitors all they ever wanted to learn about the pirates who sailed these now friendly waters.</p></div></span><span class="rm-hide" id="content-block-body"><div id="contentBlockBody"><p>A great option for both families and individuals looking to enjoy one of the <a href="https://www.expedia.com/Nassau-Hotels-Spa-Hotel.0-0-d601784-tSpaHotel.Travel-Guide-Filter-Hotels">Nassau resorts</a> is to stay at one of the <a href="https://www.expedia.com/Nassau-Hotels-All-Inclusive-Hotel.0-0-d601784-tAllinclusiveHotel.Travel-Guide-Filter-Hotels">all inclusive hotels</a> found here. Going this route for hotels in Nassau, Bahamas guarantees that you can get a cheap deal that fits your budget.</p><p>Couples love staying at one of the <a href="https://www.expedia.com/Nassau-Hotels-Luxury-Hotel.0-0-d601784-tLuxuryHotel.Travel-Guide-Filter-Hotels">luxury hotels</a> to be found in Nassau. There are a number of <a href="https://www.expedia.com/5Star-Nassau-Hotels.s50-0-d601784.Travel-Guide-Filter-Hotels">5 star hotels</a> that cater to those on their honeymoon. You can also find <a href="https://www.expedia.com/Nassau-Hotels-Boutique-Hotel.0-0-d601784-tBoutiqueHotel.Travel-Guide-Filter-Hotels">boutique hotels</a> offering a distinctly romantic and relaxing experience for guests. <a href="https://www.expedia.com/Nassau-Intl-Airport-Hotels.0-aNAS-0.Travel-Guide-Filter-Hotels">Hotels near the airport</a> are another option for visitors looking to be close to the city center.</p><p>Your <a href="https://www.expedia.com/Nassau.d601784.Destination-Travel-Guides">Nassau vacations</a> can easily be planned just by using Expedia.com. Expedia offers a number of deals on <a href="https://www.expedia.com/Cheap-Flights-To-Nassau.d601784.Travel-Guide-Flights">flights to Nassau</a>, as well as allowing you to book your <a href="https://www.expedia.com/Car-Rentals-In-Nassau.d601784.Car-Rental-Guide">car rentals</a> online so you'll easily be able to drive to hot spots like the Ardastra Gardens, Zoo and Conservation Center while on trip.</p></div></span></section><button type="button" data-content-ref="#pocket-guide-content" class="btn-text toggle-trigger" data-control="toggle"         data-expand-text="Read                         // If there is at least one entry, set commonPagePath to the pagePath of the first slot. This may be undefined
                        commonPagePath = slotConfigs[0].pagePath;
                        for (index = 1; index < slotConfigs.length; index++) {
                            // Starting with the second slot, if any slot's pagePath doesn't match the first one, set the commonPagePath to be undefined and note the mismatch.
                            // Note that if the first one is undefined, all remaining ones have to be undefined, and if the first one is set to something, all remaining slots must be set to the same value
                            if (commonPagePath !== slotConfigs[index].pagePath) {
                                commonPagePath = undefined;
                                pagePathMismatch = true;
                                break;
                            }
                        }
                    }
                },

                configureSlotsBasedOnSpecifiedValues = function() {
                    // Note: sitePath has already been validated. At this point we just need to combine it with the pagePath for each slot.
                    // If any slot doesn't have a pagePath, that would be an error.
                    var index, combinedPath;
                    window.expads.slots = window.expads.slots || {};
                    for (index = 0; index < slotConfigs.length; index++) {
                        var slotConfig = slotConfigs[index];
                        if (slotConfig.id === undefined || slotConfig.id === '' || slotConfig.width === undefined || slotConfig.width === '' || slotConfig.height === undefined || slotConfig.height === '') {
                            logError('a displayAd tag was missing some required data and will not be rendered');
                        } else if (slotConfig.pagePath === undefined || slotConfig.pagePath === '') {
                            logError('the displayAd tag with id ' + slotConfig.id + ' did not specify a pagePath, but a sitePath was configured in the adConfiguration tag. Skipping this displayAd');
                        } else {
                            combinedPath = '/' + window.expads.configuration.networkId + '/' + sitePath + '/' + slotConfig.pagePath + '/';
                            if (slotConfig.slotIdOverride !== undefined && slotConfig.slotIdOverride !== '') {
                                combinedPath += slotConfig.slotIdOverride;
                            } else {
                                combinedPath += slotConfig.id;
                            }
                            window.expads.slots[slotConfig.id] = {
                                "name": slotConfig.id,
                                "path": combinedPath,
                                "width": slotConfig.width,
                                "height": slotConfig.height,
                                "collapseEmptyDiv": slotConfig.collapseEmptyDiv
                            };
                        }
                    }
                    slotInfoLoaded = true;
                    deferredAdInfo.resolve('eligible to make adinfo service call');
                    onItemLoaded();
                },

                loadSlotInfoFromService = function() {
                    var slotInfoData = {},
                        errorMessage,
                        startTime;

                    addIfNonEmpty(slotInfoData, 'siteId', siteId);
                    addIfNonEmpty(slotInfoData, 'locale', locale);
                    addIfNonEmpty(slotInfoData, 'pageName', pageName);

                    ajax({
                        url: adInfoServiceUrl + '/adinfo/slotinfo',
                        dataType: 'json',
                        data: slotInfoData,
                        cache: true,
                        beforeSend: function () {
                            startTime = new Date().getTime();
                        },
                        done: function (data) {
                            var latency = (new Date().getTime()) - startTime;
                            logDataPoint('adSlotsLatency', latency);
                            if (isValidData(data, 'slots')) {
                                var badAds = [];
                                for(var focalSlotIndex in data.slots) {
                                    errorMessage = 'call to slotInfo service returned invalid data - ads cannot be loaded as a result';

                                    if (data.slots.hasOwnProperty(focalSlotIndex)) {
                                        if ($('#'+focalSlotIndex).length > 0) {
                                            var focalSlot = data.slots[focalSlotIndex],
                                                width = $('#' + focalSlotIndex).data('adwidth'),
                                                height = $('#' + focalSlotIndex).data('adheight'),
                                                isNative = $('#' + focalSlotIndex).data('isnative'),
                                                fail = true;    // assume

                                            if (isNative) {
                                                fail = false;
                                            } else {
                                                for (var sizeIndex in focalSlot.size) {
                                                    if (focalSlot.size.hasOwnProperty(sizeIndex)) {
                                                        var focalSize = focalSlot.size[sizeIndex];
                                                        if (focalSize.width == width && focalSize.height == height) {
                                                            fail = false;
                                                        }
                                                    }
                                                }
                                            }

                                            if (fail) {
                                                // none of the service provided sizes match this slot. report error
                                                errorMessage = focalSlotIndex + " had an invalid size from the slotinfo service.";
                                                // mark this placement as bad
                                                badAds.push(focalSlotIndex);
                                                logError(errorMessage);
                                            } else {
                                                focalSlot.width = width;
                                                focalSlot.height = height;
                                            }
                                        }
                                    }
                                }

                                slotInfoLoaded = true;
                                deferredAdInfo.resolve('eligible to make adinfo service call');
                                // remove badAds from inbound data, and any existing window.expads.slots.
                                for(var badAdIndex in badAds){
                                    var badAd = badAds[badAdIndex];

                                    delete data.slots[badAd];

                                    if (window.expads && window.expads.slots) {
                                        delete window.expads.slots[badAd];
                                    }
                                }

                                window.expads = window.expads || {};
                                window.expads.slots = $.extend(true, {}, window.expads.slots, data.slots);

                            } else {
                                deferredAdInfo.reject("prevent adinfo targeting service call because of invalid slot info data");
                                slotInfoCallCompletedWithErrors = true;
                            }
                            onItemLoaded();
                        },
                        fail: function () {
                            slotInfoCallCompletedWithErrors = true;
                            logDataPoint('adSlotsFailure', '0');
                            onItemLoaded();
                            deferredAdInfo.reject("prevent adinfo service call since slot info failed");

                        }
                    });
                },

                loadAdzerkSlotInfo = function() {
                    window.expads.slots = window.expads.slots || {};
                    window.expads.slots.adzerk = {
                        networkId: window.expads.configuration.adzerkNetworkId,
                        siteId: window.expads.configuration.adzerkSiteId,
                        placements: []
                    };
                    window.expads.slots.adzerk.placements = window.expads.configuration.adzerkPlacements;
                };

            if (sitePath !== undefined && sitePath !== '') {
                configureSlotsBasedOnSpecifiedValues();
            } else {
                determineCommonPagePath();
                if (pagePathMismatch === true) {
                    // If the site path was not specified, then all pagePath values must match
                    onItemFailed('displayAd tags on the page specified different pagePaths - ads cannot be loaded as a result');
                } else {
                    loadSlotInfoFromService();
                }
            }
            loadAdzerkSlotInfo();
        }

        function loadAdinfo(params, pageSpecificTargeting, successCallback) {
            deferredAdInfo.done(function () {
                if (typeof pageSpecificTargeting === 'function') {
                    successCallback = pageSpecificTargeting;
                    pageSpecificTargeting = {};
                }
                pageSpecificTargeting = pageSpecificTargeting || {};
                successCallback = successCallback || onItemLoaded;

                var errorMessage = 'call to targeting service returned invalid data - ads will be loaded without targeting',
                    startTime;
                ajax({
                    url: adInfoServiceUrl + '/adinfo',
                    dataType: 'json',
                    cache: false,
                    data: params,
                    xhrFields: { withCredentials: true },
                    beforeSend: function () {
                        startTime = new Date().getTime();
                    },
                    done: function(data) {
                        var latency = (new Date().getTime()) - startTime;
                        logDataPoint('adInfoLatency', latency);
                        if (isValidData(data, 'targeting')) {
                            require('expads', function(expads){
                                targetingLoaded = true;
                                window.expads.targeting = $.extend(true, defaultDFPTargetingParams(expads), data.targeting, pageSpecificTargeting);
                                successCallback(window.expads.targeting);
                            });
                        }
                    },
                    fail: function() {
                        logDataPoint('adInfoFailure', '0');
                        targetingLoaded = true;
                        logError(errorMessage);
                        onItemLoaded();
                    }
                });
            });
        }

        function cleanTargetingArgs(targeting) {
            var args = {};
            if (targeting) {
                for (var i = 0; i < adinfoArgs.length; i++) {
                    var key = adinfoArgs[i];
                    if (targeting.hasOwnProperty(key)) {
                        args[key] = targeting[key];
                        delete targeting[key];
                    }
                }
            }
            return args;
        }

        function defaultAdinfoParams() {
            var adinfoParams = {};

            loadDataFromCookies();

            addIfNonEmpty(adinfoParams, 'siteId', siteId);
            addIfNonEmpty(adinfoParams, 'userId', userId);
            if (memberId > 0) { addIfNonEmpty(adinfoParams, 'memberId', memberId); }
            addArrayIfNonEmpty(adinfoParams, 'bkc', blueKai);

            return adinfoParams;
        }

        function loadTargeting() {
            var adinfoParams = defaultAdinfoParams();

            if (usePageSpecificTargeting === true) {
                require(['expads.targeting'], function (targeting) {
                    var adinfo = cleanTargetingArgs(targeting);
                    addIfNonEmpty(adinfoParams, 'dest', adinfo.dest_region);
                    loadAdinfo(adinfoParams, targeting);
                });
            } else {
                loadAdinfo(adinfoParams);
            }
        }

        function isValidData(data, expectedProperty) {
            return (data !== undefined && typeof data === 'object'
            && data.hasOwnProperty(expectedProperty)
            && data[expectedProperty] !== undefined);
        }

        function logError(errorMessage) {
            if (scriptsLoaded) {
                require(['expads'], function(expads) {
                    expads.logging.logMessage(errorMessage);
                });
            } else if (console !== undefined && console.error !== undefined) {
                console.error(errorMessage);
            }
        }

        function logDataPoint(dataType, dataValue) {
            if (dataType !== undefined) {
                require('dctk/clientLogging', function (clientLogging) {
                    switch (dataType) {
                        case 'adInfoLatency':
                            clientLogging.logTrxEvent('adtkAdInfoLatency', ['adtkAdInfoLatency=' + encodeURIComponent(dataValue), 'adtkAdInfoSuccess=100']);
                            break;
                        case 'adInfoFailure':
                            clientLogging.logTrxEvent('adtkAdInfoSuccess', ['adtkAdInfoSuccess=0']);
                            break;
                        case 'adSlotsLatency':
                            clientLogging.logTrxEvent('adtkAdSlotsLatency', ['adtkAdSlotsLatency=' + encodeURIComponent(dataValue), 'adtkAdSlotsSuccess=100']);
                            break;
                        case 'adSlotsFailure':
                            clientLogging.logTrxEvent('adtkAdSlotsSuccess', ['adtkAdSlotsSuccess=0']);
                            break;
                    }
                });
            }
        }

        /**
         * Sorts through data from the current document.cookie collection and organizes it
         * into specifically referenced fields.
         */
        function loadDataFromCookies() {
            var cookieArray = document.cookie.split(';'),
                processMediaCookie = function(cookieValue) {
                    var parts = cookieValue.split('|'),
                        itemValues;
                    for (var i = 0; i < parts.length; i++) {
                        if (parts[i] !== undefined && parts[i].length >= 4) {
                            itemValues = parts[i].split(',');
                            if (itemValues.length >= 4) {
                                if (itemValues[2] === 'BKC') {
                                    blueKai.push(itemValues[3]);
                                } else if (itemValues[2] === 'TDEST') {
                                    tdest.push(itemValues[3]);
                                } else if (itemValues[2] === 'PDEST') {
                                    pdest.push(itemValues[3]);
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                },
                processMC1Cookie = function(cookieValue) {
                    var parts = cookieValue.split('=');
                    if (parts.length >= 2) {
                        userId = parts[1];
                    }
                };

            for (var i = 0; i < cookieArray.length; i++) {
                var cookie = trim(cookieArray[i]),
                    separatorIndex = cookie.indexOf('='),
                    name = (separatorIndex > -1) ? trim(cookie.substr(0, separatorIndex)) : undefined,
                    value = (separatorIndex > -1) ? decodeURIComponent(trim(cookie.substr(separatorIndex+1))) : undefined;

                if (name !== undefined && value !== undefined) {
                    switch(name) {
                        case 'MediaCookie':
                            processMediaCookie(value);
                            break;
                        case 'MC1':
                            processMC1Cookie(value);
                            break;
                    }
                }
            }
        }

        function initializeAds() {
            if (autoInitialize === true) {
                require('adtoolkit', function(adtk) {
                    adtk.initialize();
                });
            }
            scriptsLoaded = true;
            onItemLoaded();

            if(deferServiceCalls === false) {
                makeServiceCall();
            }
        }

        function makeServiceCall() {
            loadSlotInfo();

            // Load user targeting; if we don't auto generate user info then wait for it to be passed in
            if (autoGenerateUserInfo === true) {
                loadTargeting();
            } else {
                require('adtoolkit-user-info', function (userinfo) {
                    if (userinfo) {
                        if (userinfo.hasOwnProperty('memberId')) {
                            memberId = userinfo.memberId;
                        }
                        if (userinfo.hasOwnProperty('userId')) {
                            userId = userinfo.userId;
                        }
                        if (userinfo.hasOwnProperty('isBot')) {
                            // translate from string if string
                            isBot = (true == userinfo.isBot);
                        }
                    }
                    loadTargeting();
                });
            }
        }

        define('adtoolkit', ['expads'], function(expads) {
            return {
                initialize: function () {
                    if(deferServiceCalls === true){
                        makeServiceCall();
                    }
                    deferred.done(function () {
                        expads.initialize();
                    })
                        .fail(function (message) {
                            console.log(message);
                        });
                },
                refresh: function(targeting) {
                    if (targeting === undefined) {
                        expads.refresh();
                    } else {
                        var adinfoParams = defaultAdinfoParams(),
                            adinfo = cleanTargetingArgs(targeting);
                        addIfNonEmpty(adinfoParams, 'dest', adinfo.dest_region);
                        loadAdinfo(adinfoParams, targeting, function(updatedTargeting) {
                            expads.refresh(updatedTargeting)
                        });
                    }
                }
            }
        });

        $(document).ready(initializeAds); // TODO: should we initialize on window load or document ready?
    });
})(window, document);

</script>

        <script async defer>
    //UITK Typeahead Accessibility Fix
    require(['jquery', 'uitk', 'uitk_typeahead'], function($, uitk, uitkTypeahead){
        uitkTypeahead.prototype.next = function() {
            var links = this.$ta.find("a"),
                current = this.$ta.find(".highlight").removeClass("highlight"),
                i = links.index(current),
                next = links[i + 1],
                nextId = $(next).attr("id"),
                item, a11yText = "";
            $(current).attr("aria-selected", "false");
            if ($(links[i + 1]).hasClass("close")) {
                uitk.utils.liveAnnounce(i.t("close"), "assertive")
            }
            if (!$("html").hasClass("safari")) {
                if (this.firstItemFlag === true) {
                    this.firstItemFlag = false
                } else {
                    if (typeof links[i] === "undefined") {
                        item = $(".active-tooltip").find("a")[0];
                        a11yText = $(item).attr("data-value");
                        uitk.utils.liveAnnounce(a11yText, "polite")
                    }
                }
            }
            if (next) {
                $(next).addClass("highlight");
                $(next).attr("aria-selected", "true");
                this.$element.attr("aria-activedescendant", nextId);
                if($(next).attr("data-value")){
                    uitk.utils.liveAnnounce($(next).attr("data-value"), "polite")
                }
            } else {
                uitk.utils.liveAnnounce(this.$element.val(), "polite")
            }
        };


        uitkTypeahead.prototype.prev = function() {
            var links = this.$ta.find("a"),
                current = this.$ta.find(".highlight").removeClass("highlight"),
                i = links.index(current),
                prev = links[i - 1],
                prevId = $(prev).attr("id");
            $(current).attr("aria-selected", "false");
            if (prev) {
                $(prev).addClass("highlight");
                $(prev).attr("aria-selected", "true");
                this.$element.attr("aria-activedescendant", prevId)
                if($(prev).attr('data-value')) {
                    uitk.utils.liveAnnounce($(prev).attr('data-value'), 'polite');
                }
            } else {
                this.$element.removeAttr("aria-activedescendant");
                $('[aria-selected="true"]').attr("aria-selected", "false");
                uitk.utils.liveAnnounce(this.$element.val(), "polite")
            }
        };
    });

</script>
